doc:
Jamie Bamber https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jamie_Bamber 0 Jamie St John Bamber Griffith (born 3 April 1973) is an English/Irish/American actor, known for his roles as Lee Adama in Battlestar Galactica and Detective Sergeant Matt Devlin in the ITV series Law Order: UK. He also had a supporting role in the Hornblower series and was a regular on the British series Ultimate Force and Peak Practice. In 2013, Bamber starred in the TNT medical drama Monday Mornings, and in 2014, in the Sky 1 drama The Smoke. Jamie_St_John_Bamber_Griffith ( born 3_April_1973 ) is an_English/Irish/American_actor , known for his_roles as Lee_Adama in Battlestar_Galactica and Detective_Sergeant_Matt_Devlin in the_ITV_series_Law_ : UK . He also had a_supporting_role in the_Hornblower_series and was a_regular on the_British_series_Ultimate_Force and Peak_Practice . In 2013 , Bamber starred in the_TNT_medical_drama_Monday_Mornings , and in 2014 , in the_Sky_1_drama The_Smoke .
